select n.notice_id, n.user_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_body, n.notice_cre_date, n.notice_grade, u.user_rank, i.image_file, n.notice_match_no from notice as n inner join user as u on n.user_id = u.user_id left outer join image as i on n.notice_id = i.image_match_id where notice_category = 'comment' and n.product_id = #{product_id} order by n.notice_cre_date asc
select * from notice where product_id = #{product_id} and notice_category = 'PQA' and user_id != 'admin' order by notice_cre_date desc

insert into notice(notice_id, user_id, notice_category, notice_pw, notice_title, notice_body, notice_cre_date, notice_private, product_id, notice_match_no, notice_parent_no) values(#{notice_id}, #{user_id}, #{notice_category}, #{notice_pw}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_body}, now(), #{notice_private}, #{product_id}, #{notice_id}, '0')
mapper.select: select B.notice_id, B.notice_private, B.notice_pw, B.user_id, B.notice_category, B.notice_title, B.notice_cre_date, B.notice_match_no, (count(B.notice_match_no) -1) as notice_parent_no from notice as A inner join notice as B on (A.notice_match_no = B.notice_id) where A.notice_category = 'UQA' group by B.notice_id order by B.notice_cre_date desc
